subject: solve murder by evp?
author: kenneth b thomas
full_text:
i put a doc, #3 in photo album.  last wrting from carl

carl and mru were pioneers in evp and related phenomena.

he was having legal trouble and -apparently- death threats from an 
official of the rockefeller foundation. that person is also suspected by 
some of being involved in brain implants, faked ufo abductions and other 
horrors

a person named john lambros -who did actually have a mysterious brain 
implant- sued carl and caused unending trouble.  both carl  and 
officialx are former high ranking NSA officers.  official x is  
considered elder statesmam of nu-age movement---fake nu-age movement?  
synthetic telepathy/channeling?

earth to carl, come in carl :}
